R2 Move Tests¶

Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r2():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x2 = Crossing('x2')
 8
 9    x1[0] = x2[2]
10    x1[1] = x2[1]
11    x1[2] = x1[3]
12    x2[0] = x2[3]
13
14    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1, x2])
15
16    yp_before = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
17
18    assert yp_before == yp_ground_truth
19
20    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
21
22    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 1
23    assert ('x1', 'x2') in r2_crossing_labels or ('x2', 'x1') in r2_crossing_labels
24
25    sgd = apply_r2(sgd, ('x1', 'x2'))
26
27    yp_after = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
28
29    assert yp_after == yp_ground_truth
Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r2_2():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x2 = Crossing('x2')
 8    x3 = Crossing('x3')
 9    x4 = Crossing('x4')
10
11    e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8 = Edge(1), Edge(2), Edge(3), Edge(4), Edge(5), Edge(6), Edge(7), Edge(8)
12
13    # x1
14    x1[0] = e8[0]
15    x1[1] = e2[0]
16    x1[2] = e1[0]
17    x1[3] = e1[1]
18
19    # x2
20    x2[0] = e7[1]
21    x2[1] = e2[1]
22    x2[2] = e8[1]
23    x2[3] = e3[0]
24
25    # x3
26    x3[0] = e6[1]
27    x3[1] = e4[0]
28    x3[2] = e7[0]
29    x3[3] = e3[1]
30
31    # x4
32    x4[0] = e5[1]
33    x4[1] = e4[1]
34    x4[2] = e6[0]
35    x4[3] = e5[0]
36
37    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1, x2, x3, x4, e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8])
38
39    yp_before_r2s = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
40
41    assert yp_before_r2s == yp_ground_truth
42
43    # Remove the first loop
44
45    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
46
47    assert len(
48        r2_crossing_labels) == 3  # I intended it to be 2, but since both loops are on the same side, the edge 3 can also be treated as a loop.
49    assert ('x1', 'x2') in r2_crossing_labels or ('x2', 'x1') in r2_crossing_labels
50
51    sgd = apply_r2(sgd, ('x1', 'x2'))
52
53    yp_after_first_r2 = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
54
55    assert yp_after_first_r2 == yp_ground_truth
56
57    # Remove the second loop
58
59    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
60
61    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 1
62    assert ('x3', 'x4') in r2_crossing_labels or ('x4', 'x3') in r2_crossing_labels
63
64    sgd = apply_r2(sgd, ('x3', 'x4'))
65
66    yp_after_second_r2 = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
67
68    assert yp_after_second_r2 == yp_ground_truth
69
70    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
71
72    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 0
Example Test Function¶
 1def test_r2_3():
 2    a = pari('A')
 3
 4    yp_ground_truth = -a ** 2 - a - 1
 5
 6    x1 = Crossing('x1')
 7    x2 = Crossing('x2')
 8    x3 = Crossing('x3')
 9    x4 = Crossing('x4')
10
11    e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8 = Edge(1), Edge(2), Edge(3), Edge(4), Edge(5), Edge(6), Edge(7), Edge(8)
12
13    # x1
14    x1[0] = e8[0]
15    x1[1] = e2[0]
16    x1[2] = e1[0]
17    x1[3] = e1[1]
18
19    # x2
20    x2[0] = e7[1]
21    x2[1] = e2[1]
22    x2[2] = e8[1]
23    x2[3] = e3[0]
24
25    # x3
26    x3[0] = e3[1]
27    x3[1] = e6[1]
28    x3[2] = e4[0]
29    x3[3] = e7[0]
30
31    # x4
32    x4[0] = e5[0]
33    x4[1] = e5[1]
34    x4[2] = e4[1]
35    x4[3] = e6[0]
36
37    sgd = SpatialGraphDiagram([x1, x2, x3, x4, e1, e2, e3, e4, e5, e6, e7, e8])
38
39    yp_before_r2s = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
40
41    assert yp_before_r2s == yp_ground_truth
42
43    # Remove the first loop
44
45    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
46
47    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 2
48    assert ('x1', 'x2') in r2_crossing_labels or ('x2', 'x1') in r2_crossing_labels
49
50    sgd = apply_r2(sgd, ('x1', 'x2'))
51
52    yp_after_first_r2 = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
53
54    assert yp_after_first_r2 == yp_ground_truth
55
56    # Remove the second loop
57
58    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
59
60    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 1
61    assert ('x3', 'x4') in r2_crossing_labels or ('x4', 'x3') in r2_crossing_labels
62
63    sgd = apply_r2(sgd, ('x3', 'x4'))
64
65    yp_after_second_r2 = sgd.normalized_yamada_polynomial()
66
67    assert yp_after_second_r2 == yp_ground_truth
68
69    r2_crossing_labels = has_r2(sgd)
70
71    assert len(r2_crossing_labels) == 0
